Title: Smardt Chillers in Indian data centre deal
Summary: CANADA/INDIA: Montreal-based Smardt Chillers is to supply its oil-free centrifugal chillers to Indian company Shree Refrigerations, a leading player in cooling solutions serving the defence sector.

Title: Trane sounds the NYSE opening bell
Summary: USA: Trane Technologies has rung the New York Stock Exchange opening bell to celebrate its fifth year as an HVACR-focused company.

Title: Leak testing with oxygen caused heat pump blast
Summary: POLAND: Authorities in Opole have concluded that the heat pump explosion in Chrząstowice that killed two people last year was caused by using oxygen to carry out pressure tests.

Title: CTC partners with The Merchant’s Choice group
Summary: UK: Go Geothermal, the UK distributor of CTC heat pumps, has announced a partnership with The Merchant’s Choice, a specialist buying group for plumbers’ merchants.

Title: Improving service across London and the SE
Summary: UK: Wolseley brands Pipe Centre and Climate Centre have unveiled a new logistics model to improve customer service across London and the SE.

Title: Sanhua adds new sight glasses
Summary: SPAIN: Sanhua has introduced a new range of sight glasses engineered for high-pressure refrigerants.

Title: Trane sounds the NYSE opening bell
Summary: USA: Trane Technologies has rung the New York Stock Exchange opening bell to celebrate its fifth year as an HVACR focused company.

Title: Leak testing with oxygen caused heat pump blast
Summary: POLAND: Authorities in Opole have concluded that the heat pump explosion in Chrząstowice that killed two people last year was caused by using oxygen to carry out pressure tests.

Title: Ambienta acquires Bonera Refrigerazioni
Summary: ITALY: Frigoveneta, the Verona-based commercial and industrial refrigeration contractor has acquired Bonera Refrigerazioni Srl, a family-owned company specialising in the design, installation, and after-sales servicing of industrial refrigeration systems.

Title: Pilot scheme to incentivise refrigerant recovery
Summary: USA: A new refrigerant recovery scheme in the District of Columbia aims to helps contractors offset the costs of recovery equipment while also providing an additional revenue stream.

Title: ESEAC cuts peak demand and lowers energy bills
Summary: USA: The integration of energy storage, cooling, and humidity control into a single commercial system has been developed by the US National Renewable Energy Laboratory and Blue Frontier.

Title: 200 jobs to go in Daikin heat pump restructure
Summary: GERMANY: Daikin is to transfer hydrobox and hydrokit heat pump unit production from its plant in Güglingen, Germany, to the Czech Republic, with the loss of some 200 jobs.

Title: Polish customs seize 42 tonnes of F-gas
Summary: POLAND: Officers from Poland’s National Revenue Administration (KAS) have seized 42 tonnes of smuggled F-gas, valued at nearly €1m.

Title: Lennox RTU meets cold climate challenge
Summary: USA: Lennox is claiming that its commercial heat pump rooftop unit is the first to successfully complete the US Department of Energy’s cold climate challenge in the 15-25 tons category.

Title: Improving service across London and the SE
Summary: UK: Wolseley brands Pipe Centre and Climate Centre have unveiled a new logistics model to improve its customer service across London and the SE.

Title: Samsung signs up service company HomeServe
Summary: UK: Samsung Climate Solutions has announced a partnership with UK service and maintenance company, HomeServe, to grow its existing heat pump service and repair network.

Title: Scheme to aid access to MCS certification
Summary: UK: EDF has partnered with Daikin UK with a scheme to help boost heat pump installs by enabling installers without MCS certification to access the Boiler Upgrade Scheme.

Title: Sanhua adds new sight glasses
Summary: SPAIN: Sanhua has introduced a new range of sight glasses engineered for high-pressure refrigerants.

Title: Scalable data centre liquid cooling solution
Summary: UK: Johnson Controls has expanded its data centre thermal management offerings with the launch of the Silent-Aire coolant distribution unit (CDU) platform.

Title: Midea ATA heat pump built for Nordic homes
Summary: GERMANY: Midea is to introduce an air-to-air heat pump for Nordic homes, which is said to produce reliable heating even at -40°C.

Title: ASHRAE conference 2026 call for abstracts
Summary: USA: ASHRAE has opened the call for abstracts for its 2026 Annual Conference, which will take place from June 27 to July 1, 2026, in Austin, Texas.
